author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Empee Distilleries Limited
description: Empee Distilleries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Non Compliance as per Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation Disclosure Requirements) Regulations.
articleBody: Empee Distilleries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Non Compliance as per Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation Disclosure Requirements) Regulations.Source : NSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Empee Distilleries' board meeting on August 21, 2017
description: a) To consider and approve the Boards' Report for the financial year 2016-17.&lt;BR&gt; b) To consider holding of AGM. &lt;BR&gt; c) To consider and approve the Notice of AGM.&lt;BR&gt; d) To announce the date of Book closure. &lt;BR&gt;
articleBody: a) To consider and approve the Boards' Report for the financial year 2016-17. b) To consider holding of AGM.  c) To consider and approve the Notice of AGM. d) To announce the date of Book closure. Source : BSE

headline: Empee Distilleries board meeting on Feb 13, 2017
description: Empee Distilleries has informed that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on February 13, 2017, to consider the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended December 31, 2016. To consider a proposal to sell the investments held in M/s. Empee Hotels Ltd.
articleBody: Empee Distilleries Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on February 13, 2017, inter alia, to consider the following:1. Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended December 31, 2016.2. To consider a proposal to sell the investments held in M/s. Empee Hotels Ltd.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Empee Distiller

headline: Empee Distilleries: Outcome of board meeting
description: Empee Distilleries in its meeting held on April 27, 2016, has approved allotment of 14%, 375 Nos. Secured, Rated, Listed, Redeemable Non-Convertible Debentures of Rs. 10,00,000 each to aggregating Rs. 37.50 crores to select investors under Private placement basis.
articleBody: Empee Distilleries Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on April 27, 2016, has approved allotment of 14%, 375 Nos. Secured, Rated, Listed, Redeemable Non-Convertible Debentures of Rs. 10,00,000 each to aggregating Rs. 37.50 crores to select investors under Private placement basis.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Empee Distiller

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Empee Power ceases to be subsidiary of Empee Distilleries
description: Empee Distilleries Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on February 11, 2015, have approved sale of 1,33,67,000 equity shares of Rs. 10 each to M/s. Appollo Alchobev Limited. Accordingly Empee Power and Infrastructure Pvt. Ltd will cease to be a subsidiary Company of Empee Distilleries Ltd.
articleBody: Empee Distilleries Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on February 11, 2015, have approved sale of 1,33,67,000 equity shares of Rs. 10 each (which constitutes 89.85% of share capital held in M/s. Empee Power and Infrastructure Pvt. Ltd) aggregating to Rs. 13,36,70,000/- to M/s. Appollo Alchobev Limited.Accordingly Empee Power and Infrastructure Pvt. Ltd will cease to be a subsidiary Company of Empee Distilleries Ltd.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Empee Distiller

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Empee Power becomes subsidiary of Empee Distilleries
description: Empee Distilleries Ltd has informed BSE that the Company has invested and acquired 89.85% in equity shares capital of M/s. Empee Power and Infrastructure Private Limited on October 30, 2014 and has become a Subsidiary of the Company.
articleBody: Empee Distilleries Ltd has informed BSE that the Company has invested and acquired 89.85% in equity shares capital of M/s. Empee Power and Infrastructure Private Limited on October 30, 2014 and has become a Subsidiary of the Company.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Empee Distiller

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Empee Distilleries: Outcome of board meeting
description: Empee Distilleries Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on October 25, 2014, inter alia, decided to withdraw the Composite Scheme of Amalgamation of the Company with Empee Sugars and Chemicals Ltd, pending before the Hon'ble High Court, Andhra Pradesh.
articleBody: Empee Distilleries Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on October 25, 2014, inter alia, decided to withdraw the Composite Scheme of Amalgamation of the Company with Empee Sugars and Chemicals Ltd, pending before the Hon'ble High Court, Andhra Pradesh.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Empee Distiller

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Empee Distilleries: Board meeting on Oct 25, 2014
description: Empee Distilleries has board meeting will be held on October 25, 2014, to consider the following: 1. Unaudited financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2014.
articleBody: Empee Distilleries Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on October 25, 2014, inter alia, to consider the following:1. Unaudited financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2014.2. To discuss on further process on the Composite Scheme of Amalgamation of Empee Sugars and Chemicals Limited with the Company, pending before the Hon'ble High Court, Andhra Pradesh.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Empee Distiller
